title: seyya vANDum
sahitya:
seyya vENDum kaDamai sheiguvOm jagadIshan Anai ena uiguvOm


anupallavi

  kaiyum meyyum karuttum shollum karuttUnri gavanamAga


caraNam    inimaiyAna karuNai kATTi innalaccat-tuyarai vITTi 
tanimaiyAna dhyAnam kUTTi shakti vaLarum sAdhanam ena
shikharamAna.  no givan rAgA or tALA.  
caraNam 1    shikharamAna shiva jyOti cid-vilAsa caitanyam tigazhum inbak-kanalAna murugOnE
 caraNam 2    tagara vEda guha nAdam taka takenna naTamADit-taNaLuginra paranAtha vaDivOnE
 caraNam 3    ukaramAna pAmbu vaLar makaramAna mayil mElE akaramAna vITrirukkum aruLALA
 caraNam 4    sakala vEda sAram adAm praNava mantra rUpam adAm parama shuddha shakti mayap-paramAtmA
